name: Elizabeth Spurlock
text: The employees are very friendly and keep the serving tables clean. The pizzas come out of the kitchen steadly and special request are no problem. My son thinks the games are great too. We love this CC's!

name: tony much
text: Request just about anything on a pizza and they will make it! They even had a Boston creme filling on a pizza. All for an extremely low price of $6.99 ALL you can eat!

name: Jenny K
text: We love taking our kids here!  For the price and what you get, you can't beat it.  The salad bar has lots of veggies.  Lots of different pizzas to choose from.  Small arcade.  Large, clean restaurant.  Only 4 stars because they've raised their prices significantly over the past few years.

name: Rachel Ram
text: An excellent bargain establishment! We ate here for our family birthday dinner and felt that we got a great value for what we got. You can use the $19 Groupon for four people.

name: Tony Dice
text: After a long day and some heat time to pig out

name: whitney sundrla
text: This place has made a huge turn around in 6 months. Everything was fresh and associates were 100 times better... my husband is very hard to please and 6 months ago said he wouldn't ever go back to this location. However we decided to give it a shot and was very pleased with the new management.

name: baby yoda vloggs
text: Walked in at 3:50 pm to be told they had been ‚Äúshut down‚Äù and didn‚Äôt have any more pizza at all in the back. Then they tried to stop us from leaving as we were walking out offering to ‚Äúmake some more pizza for y‚Äôall ‚Äú  like what.... no... why were you guys shut down??? ‚Äú needless to say we are heading elsewhere.

name: Harmony Smith
text: Wish there were more varieties to choose from. You go to get drinks and you smell the bathrooms immediately. Rotten tomatoes mixed into the fresh ones. No ice in machine,  I told the worker but they never fixed it. And also they ‚Ä¶More

name: Vegeto Blackity Black
text: Met the nicest guy ever there. He said his name was Cham with an S sound for the C. I have a broken leg and he brought me all my food. Never seen such hospitality. Came back just for that guys kindness. Brought my wife, brother, her sister and all our kids. We spent $97 and all thanks to that nice table wiper guy.

name: Cruise Cycle
text: It was OK. A typical bargain basement all you can eat pizza place, it has it's place in the restaurant choice galaxy. We wind up going to one of these every few years for various secondary reasons, and that frequency is enough until another secondary episode comes along again prompting a new visit.

name: mark anderson
text: Depending on the time of day and how busy determines what pizzas are available at the buffet. Of course they can make any special pizzas while you wait. Restrooms available. They're getting cheap on service, expect to clean up your own table as well as everything is going to paper.

name: suncoast trains
text: No paper towels or soap in mens room. No sweet tea and my debit card has disappeared. I don't think the lady gave it back to me and I called and they dont have it. Be careful here!

name: Yarian Sanchez
text: My son loves coming to Cici's!! The pizza is good and they have a little arcade room for the kids. You can also request a personalized pizza, which I think it's great. Their spinach pizza is the best!

name: Papa Cannoli
text: Also cheap and filling, great for those days when you're completely empty.

name: Foodie On Wheelz
text: If I could give this location 0 stars I definitely would! Management & employees are rude except for one employer that was nice. All of the employees clearly don‚Äôt pay attention because they are constantly talking to one another & you can ‚Ä¶More

name: Laurenz Deganos
text: If you want a place to hangout with your friends and enjoy a meal, Cici's is the Place! Love! Salad Bar and Pizza selection!

name: Diabetic Dad
text: My wife had never had BBQ or Buffalo Chicken pizza...she loved them both. We also requested a spinach alfredo flatbread and it really good too. Kids had a great time...even with required trip to the salad bar.

name: Joe Palladino
text: Where can you get a variety of different pizzas, you ask? Come to CiCi's and get your fill of as much pizza that you would like. Cannot beat that and cannot beat the price. Highly reccomend

name: Pamela Hammond
text: Awful experience. To spend $35.00 to wait on pizza is expensive. Everyone in the restaurant was standing at the bar with empty plates. As soon as pizza came out, it was gone in seconds. Hot drinks...NO ICE. Staff didn't seem to happy to work here... Not ONE "welcome to cici"

name: D Johns
text: Excellent evening customer service.  Great desserts. I didnt get the name of the guy that kept the dining area cleaned - he did a wonderful job.

name: Dexter Roy
text: Great place for a quick bite on the highway. They always keep a few pizzas ready and warm to eat. The service is super quick and it‚Äôs yummy too.

name: Tim Miller

text:
Once we went for a birthday party, they gave free coupon to the birthday boy!
Nice people , friendly workers.
Personal orders are best even with buffet. Buffet here is unlimited so come empty and go FULL.

text: Cheap  price, good services, Clean area

text: Food is good, but we have been here like 4 different times now and there is no ice and soda was flat. So don't waste money on overpriced drinks

text: Pizza was crappy and some were not all the way cooked.  I've definitely been to better Cici's. My family and I will not be back.

text: This CiCi's was horrible , food was cold and restaurant bathroom smelled terrible. Heads up they charge for babies, 1 year old. I definitely would not recommend.

text: Highly recommend coming here if you think can eat a lot or if you are a college student. With a Student ID it's literally only $5.30 including tax for all you can eat and drink! Food is good and if you don't like something they can always make another batch or customize a pizza for you!
